alert.note: Alert for Chester; Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:32PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND NORTHEASTERN CHESTER COUNTIES... At 232 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Royersford, or 16 miles north of West Chester, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Pottstown, Phoenixville, West Norriton, Collegeville, Royersford, Trappe, Schwenksville, Green Lane, Pughtown, Spring Mount, Valley Forge, Chester Springs, Cedarville, King Of Prussia, Skippack, Stowe, Spring City, Pottsgrove, South Pottstown and Evansburg. This includes Pennsylvania Turnpike near mile marker 309. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
